ohu amerikanu dolar miliyana 2.4 kata (rupiyal koti 26 kata) kalkata pilata alewi wiya.dakunu api්rakawe jak kalis dolar milina 1.1 kata (rupiyal koti 12) kalkata pilata alewi wiya.ostreliyawa wenuwen wissayi 20 tharaga 3 kata pamanak krida kala thun iriyaw kridaka daniyel kristiyan dolar laksha 9 kata dekan charjars pilata alewi wima wisheshayen kapi penuni.pasugiya tharagamalawe mumbayi pilata krida kala lasith malinga, sachin thendulkar kridaka wendesiye alewi nowi thama supurudu kandayam niyojanaya kirime awasthawa udakara gath kridakayan athara sitithi..

age pashchath marana parikshanaya pawathwu (12) kolambaa athireka mahesthrath ogasta athapaththu mahathmiya mala sirura maranakariyage samiya wana nawala padinchi chandrasekara mudiyanselage gamini chandrasekara wetha bara dimata niyama kalaya.ema sirura boralla kanaththe di bhumadanaya kirimata niyama kala mahesthrathwariya marana parikshana saha adhikarana waidya warayage warthawa me masa 29 dina adhikaranayata idiripath karana lesa polisiyata niyama kalaya.
eeta amatharawa sigiri kawyayanhi sandahan athulawatiya, salagala, kebalnapana, wehelnaru, wanagalu, manapawu, kalapa, wani piriwen namayanda handunagatha hakiya.
